name: Glorious Charge
description: Activating Glorious Charge starts a 10 second timer which reveals the Outpost and the nearby area to all players, when the timer ends all nearby military units will get +50% movement speed and take -15% less damage for 30 seconds.
descriptionCN: 启用“荣光冲锋”能力将产生一个时长为 10 秒的计时器，并在此期间向所有玩家显示哨站及其附近区域。当计时器结束时，哨站附近的所有军事单位将获得 +50% 移动速度，受到的伤害 -15%，持续 30 秒。
